author: coffeebank
install_msg: Thanks for installing, I hope you enjoy :) To stay up to date with breaking changes, you might want to join my Support Discord. To find documentation, Discord, and more, drop by the GitHub repo at https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: msgmover
short: Move messages across channels and servers
description:
Make moving messages between channels/servers easy and integrated, using webhooks.

'msgcopy': Copy messages from one channel to another. Move whole conversations, or merge channels easily with re-uploaded attachments, bot messages, and usernames/profiles replicated in full. Includes timestamp spacers.

'msgrelay': Forward messages from one channel to another channel/server. Relay messages between different servers to bridge communities and share content. Supports usernames/profile pics, replies, attachments (files/images/video), and embeds (bot command replies). Supports edited/deleted messages. Supports forwarding to multiple webhooks/channels.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
